mapper.select: SELECT g.*, ht.teamName as homeTeamName, ht.shortName as homeTeamShortName, at.teamName as awayTeamName, at.shortName as awayTeamShortName, v.venueName FROM games g JOIN teams ht ON g.homeTeamId = ht.id JOIN teams at ON g.awayTeamId = at.id JOIN venues v ON g.venueId = v.id WHERE g.id = #{gameId}

SELECT DISTINCT si.*, s.seatName, s.seatColor FROM seat_inventory si JOIN seats s ON si.seatId = s.id JOIN prices p ON s.id = p.seatId JOIN games g ON si.gameId = g.id WHERE si.gameId = #{gameId} AND p.sportId = g.sportId AND p.teamId = g.homeTeamId AND p.venueId = g.venueId
SELECT * FROM seats WHERE id = #{seatId}
SELECT p.*, tt.category, tt.name as ticketTypeName, tt.description FROM prices p JOIN ticket_types tt ON p.ticketTypeId = tt.id WHERE p.seatId = #{seatId} ORDER BY tt.category, tt.id
SELECT * FROM sport_booking_policies WHERE sportId = #{sportId}

SELECT at.id, at.advanceTicketNumber, at.expiresAt, at.used FROM advance_tickets at JOIN registered_advance_tickets rat ON at.id = rat.advanceTicketId WHERE rat.memberId = #{memberId} AND at.expiresAt > NOW() AND at.used = FALSE ORDER BY at.expiresAt ASC

SELECT r.id AS reservationId, r.reservationNumber, g.homeTeamId, ht.teamName AS homeTeamName, g.awayTeamId, at.teamName AS awayTeamName, g.gameDate, g.gameTime, r.ticketAmount, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CONCAT(g.gameDate, ' ', g.gameTime), INTERVAL sbp.cancellationDeadlineMinutesBeforeStart MINUTE), '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS cancelDeadline, r.status, r.createdAt FROM reservations r JOIN games g ON r.gameId = g.id JOIN teams ht ON g.homeTeamId = ht.id JOIN teams at ON g.awayTeamId = at.id JOIN sport_booking_policies sbp ON g.sportId = sbp.sportId WHERE r.memberId = #{memberId} AND r.status = '예매완료' ORDER BY r.createdAt DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT r.id AS reservationId, r.reservationNumber, r.canceledAt, g.homeTeamId, ht.teamName AS homeTeamName, g.awayTeamId, at.teamName AS awayTeamName, g.gameDate, g.gameTime, r.ticketAmount, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CONCAT(g.gameDate, ' ', g.gameTime), INTERVAL sbp.cancellationDeadlineMinutesBeforeStart MINUTE), '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS cancelDeadline, r.status, r.createdAt FROM reservations r JOIN games g ON r.gameId = g.id JOIN teams ht ON g.homeTeamId = ht.id JOIN teams at ON g.awayTeamId = at.id JOIN sport_booking_policies sbp ON g.sportId = sbp.sportId WHERE r.memberId = #{memberId} AND r.status = '취소완료' ORDER BY r.createdAt DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reservations WHERE memberId = #{memberId} AND status = '예매완료'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reservations r JOIN games g ON r.gameId = g.id WHERE r.memberId = #{memberId} AND r.status = '예매완료' AND CONCAT(g.gameDate, ' ', g.gameTime) > NOW()

SELECT r.*, g.gameDate, g.gameTime, g.sportId, ht.teamName AS homeTeamName, at.teamName AS awayTeamName, m.name AS memberName, v.venueName, CASE WHEN r.totalAmount = 0 THEN '스포츠 예매권' ELSE '신용카드' END AS paymentMethod FROM reservations r JOIN games g ON r.gameId = g.id JOIN teams ht ON g.homeTeamId = ht.id JOIN teams at ON g.awayTeamId = at.id JOIN members m ON r.memberId = m.id JOIN venues v ON g.venueId = v.id WHERE r.id = #{reservationId}

SELECT rd.*, s.id AS seatId, s.seatName, tt.name AS ticketTypeName FROM reservation_details rd JOIN seats s ON rd.seatId = s.id JOIN ticket_types tt ON rd.ticketTypeId = tt.id WHERE rd.reservationId = #{reservationId}

SELECT at.advanceTicketNumber, at.expiresAt, p.price AS ticketPrice FROM advance_ticket_usage atu JOIN advance_tickets at ON atu.advanceTicketId = at.id JOIN reservation_details rd ON atu.reservationId = rd.reservationId JOIN prices p ON rd.seatId = p.seatId AND rd.ticketTypeId = p.ticketTypeId WHERE atu.reservationId = #{reservationId}

SELECT DISTINCT at.advanceTicketNumber, at.id, at.expiresAt, p.price FROM advance_ticket_usage atu JOIN advance_tickets at ON atu.advanceTicketId = at.id JOIN reservation_details rd ON atu.reservationId = rd.reservationId JOIN prices p ON rd.seatId = p.seatId AND p.ticketTypeId = 8 WHERE atu.reservationId = #{reservationId}

SELECT g.*, ht.shortName AS homeTeamShortName, at.shortName AS awayTeamShortName, v.venueName, sbp.bookingOpenDaysBefore, sbp.bookingOpenTime, DATE_FORMAT(g.gameDate, '%Y.%m.%d(%a)') AS formattedGameDate, DATE_FORMAT(g.gameTime, '%H:%i') AS formattedGameTime, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(g.gameDate, INTERVAL sbp.bookingOpenDaysBefore DAY), '%Y.%m.%d(%a)') AS openDate, DATE_FORMAT(sbp.bookingOpenTime, '%H:%i') AS openTime FROM games g JOIN teams ht ON g.homeTeamId = ht.id JOIN teams at ON g.awayTeamId = at.id JOIN venues v ON g.venueId = v.id JOIN sports s ON g.sportId = s.id JOIN sport_booking_policies sbp ON g.sportId = sbp.sportId WHERE s.sportName = #{sport} AND g.gameDate >= #{today} AND DATE_SUB(g.gameDate, INTERVAL sbp.bookingOpenDaysBefore DAY) >= #{today} ORDER BY DATE_SUB(g.gameDate, INTERVAL sbp.bookingOpenDaysBefore DAY) ASC, g.gameTime ASC LIMIT 10

SELECT r.id AS reservationId, r.reservationNumber, g.gameDate, g.gameTime, ht.teamName AS homeTeamName, at.teamName AS awayTeamName FROM reservations r JOIN games g ON r.gameId = g.id JOIN teams ht ON g.homeTeamId = ht.id JOIN teams at ON g.awayTeamId = at.id WHERE r.memberId = #{memberId} AND r.status = '예매완료' AND CONCAT(g.gameDate, ' ', g.gameTime) > NOW() ORDER BY g.gameDate ASC, g.gameTime ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservations (reservationNumber, memberId, gameId, totalAmount, ticketAmount, bookingFee, status) VALUES (#{reservationNumber}, #{memberId}, #{gameId}, #{totalAmount}, #{ticketAmount}, #{bookingFee}, #{status})
